original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 14.23. Cetasikadukādi
analyzed: cetasika duka ādi

original: Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha, purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā pañca pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittānuparivattiṁ
analyzed: citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe citta anuparivatti

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na citta anuparivattī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī
analyzed: citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: bāhiram dhammam paṭicca na bāhiraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca bāhiram ca dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: upādā dhammam paṭicca noupādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: no upādā dhammam paṭicca na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: upādā ca no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: upādinnam ca anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro

original: Mahantaradukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: mahantara dukam niṭṭhita
